sub_title: Frontman, orchestra director, violin soloist, composer & arranger 'The Maestro & The European Pop Orchestra'
summary:
𝐆𝐮𝐢𝐝𝐨 𝐃𝐢𝐞𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐧 is an orchestra leader, violin soloist, arranger and composer. He grew up in a special musical family in Limburg (The Netherlands). Guido's great-grandfather, grandfather and father were all conductors and with it his great musical examples. At an early age Guido established his name as a concert master and soloist of various orchestras and then continued his career as conductor, violinist and soloist with his own orchestra and successful concert tours in Europe and North America. 

𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐨 & 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐄𝐮𝐫𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐚𝐧 𝐏𝐨𝐩 𝐎𝐫𝐜𝐡𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐚 is a contemporary pop orchestra led by orchestra leader, violin soloist and composer Guido Dieteren. Together with singer and wife Wendy Kokkelkoren, Guido and his orchestra prove that pop and classical blend harmoniously. The '𝐏𝐨𝐩 𝐌𝐞𝐞𝐭𝐬 𝐂𝐥𝐚𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐜' music style guarantees a musical total experience full of romance, emotion, passion and energy. Well-known melodies are redesigned and complemented by many self-composed works by Guido. The Maestro & The European Pop Orchestra presents a rousing total experience, from goosebumps to party. 

𝐒𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐡𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐬 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐨 & 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐄𝐮𝐫𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐚𝐧 𝐏𝐨𝐩 𝐎𝐫𝐜𝐡𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐚:
- Nine (multiple) platinum CDs/ DVDs and 3 gold records. 
- Played live for more than 2.8 million visitors.
- Successful tours in the US, Canada and China. 
- Collaborated with many international artists, including Lionel Richie, Simply Red, Diana Ross, Andrea Bocelli, Marco Borsato, Anouk, DJ Afro Jack, Caro Emerald, DJ Radical Redemption, Petula Clark, Tommy Fleming, Helmut Lotti, The Three Degrees, VoXXclub, Oleta Adams, Alessandro Safina, The Ten Tenors, Van Kampen Percussion, Florian Silbereisen, Jan Smit and many others. 
- Commercials Guido composed music for or took part of: McDonald's, Rabobank, WWF (Seastars) and DELA. The DELA commercial "Why wait with saying something beautiful" won the prestigious 'Cannes Lion d'Or Grand Prix' prize in Cannes (FR). 
- Big TV appearances primetime in The Netherlands, Belgium, USA, Canada, China, Germany, Austria and 
Switzerland. 
- Musically ultimately responsible and participatory in the concept 'Symphonica in Rosso'.

𝐔𝐩𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐣𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐬:
- Theatertour 'Pop Meets Classic' in Heerlen, Venlo and Venray (NL) (2023).
- The Maestro Live In Kerkrade, open air concert, August 19, 2023.
- Flexiforum Christmas Concert (Kerkrade) (NL) (2023).
- Christmas Concert Oud-Turnhout (NL) (2023).
- USA - Palm Desert, CA (The McCullum Theatre), January 12 and 13, 2024.

projects.title: Symphonica in Rosso
projects.description:
Symphonica in Rosso is known as the most prestigious and highquality music concert in the Netherlands. The combination of the largest (inter)national pop artists together with The Maestro & The European Pop Orchestra guarantees a musical spectacle. 

Special pop meets classic battles, a giant stage, special lighting and sound techniques, impressive visuals and the color red, make Symphonica in Rosso an overwhelming concert every year. 

So far, the following artists were the main acts of Symphonica in Rosso: Marco Borsato, Paul de Leeuw, Lionel Richie, Diana Ross, Sting, Nick and Simon, Doe Maar, Anouk, Dolly Dots, Marco Borsato (2nd time) and Simply Red.

projects.title: 'From Holland With Love' - TV Special
projects.description: 'From Holland With Love' a TV Special of The Maestro & The European Pop Orchestra, recorded on the market square of Kerkrade (NL). This special contains the most beautiful live recordings of the open-air concerts, performed by The Maestro & The European Pop Orchestra. With his pop orchestra, Maestro Guido – who is also a composer and arranger – builds a bridge between pop and classical.

projects.description: On her new CD ‘Love Of My Life’ Wendy presents a nice mix of ‘Pop Meets Classic’ songs. Wendy’s beautiful voice, in collaboration with the orchestral accompaniment of The European Pop Orchestra, make this album a real musical gem.

contributors.headline: Frontman, orchestra director, violin soloist, composer & arranger 'The Maestro & The European Pop Orchestra'

projects.title: 'Live In The Netherlands' - CD/ TV Special
projects.description: 'Live in The Netherlands' a CD/ TV Special of The Maestro & The European Pop Orchestra, recorded on the market square of Kerkrade (NL). This special contains the most beautiful live recordings of the open-air concerts, performed by The Maestro & The European Pop Orchestra. With his pop orchestra, Maestro Guido – who is also a composer and arranger – builds a bridge between pop and classical. Emma-Sophie Dieteren, the daughter of Guido Dieteren and singing soloist Wendy Kokkelkoren shines in the number "Mama". An album with goosebumps moments, wonderful guest artists, recognizable compositions, and cheerful conviviality.

contributors.headline: Frontman, orchestra director, violin soloist, composer & arranger 'The Maestro & The European Pop Orchestra'

projects.title: 'Maestro of Music' - CD/ TV Special
projects.description: 'Maestro of Music' a CD/ TV Special of The Maestro & The European Pop Orchestra, recorded on the market square of Kerkrade (NL). The CD/ TV Special contains the most beautiful and passionate Pop Meets Classic songs. Vocalist Wendy Kokkelkoren excels in many songs on this CD/ TV Special and in a number of songs we hear pop singer Roy Verbeek. Extra special is the debut of daughter Emma-Sophie Dieteren. Together with mother Wendy, her debut performance 'Samen voor Altijd'.

Own compositions are moving as well as danceable, whereas well-known sing-along songs are presented in a new, fantastic Guido’s Orchestra arrangement.

company.name: The Maestro & The European Pop Orchestra

profile_positions.company: The Maestro & The European Pop Orchestra
profile_positions.title: Frontman, orchestra director, violin soloist, composer & arranger

profile_positions.description: The production company for Guido’s Orchestra and Wendy Kokkelkoren. Revi Music BV organises and produces concerts and CD/ DVD/ studio recordings. It also functions as our management and booking agency.
profile_positions.title: CEO and Owner

profile_positions.description:
The own record label of Revi Music. We publish a lot of pop meets classic & classic meets pop repertoire, as well as music for pop orchestra, pop band and classical orchestra.
We also publish sheet music.
profile_positions.title: CEO and Owner

profile_positions.description: I had a great time as the first violinist in this wonderful, world-class production. I travelled a musical journey around the world. Great man, great company.
profile_positions.title: First violinist
